name: regift me wine cozy
notes:
> my 2025 end of yerar gift to everyone in the
> knitting community. thank you so much
> for your support and happy
> knitting to all in 2026!!


a perfect last-minute gift that can be created in just a few short hours. this wine cozy is the gift that keeps on giving – a regifting gem. but if you don’t want to part with the one you made or received, this also makes a wonderful cozy for a wine bottle flower vase.


**sizes**:  one size – to fit one standard bottle of wine or spirits.
**measurements:** 9” / 23 cm circumference. 10”/ 25.5 cm height.
**yarn**: approximately 80 - 100 yds of bulky or super bulky yarn.

sample was made with 90 yds of cascade 128 superwash (bulky) in color 817 white.


**gauge:** 14 sts 20 rows = 4” / 10 cm in st st on larger needle. 18 sts = 4” / 10 cm in cable stitch pattern on larger needle.
**needles:** us 8 (5mm) and 10 (6 mm) long circular needle for magic loop method or set of double pointed needle or size needed to obtain gauge. two double pointed needles for making the i – cord. 
**notions**: cable needle, stitch marker
